physical_examinations.vital_signs: TSH: <0.03 U/ml (normal 0.50–5.70); Free T3: 520 pg/dl (normal 220–400); Free T4: 1.12 ng/dl (normal 0.89–1.80)
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: 1.5-cm right-sided thyroid nodule; suppressed serum TSH; elevated serum-free T3; typical cafe-au-lait skin pigmentation; stigmata of fibrous dysplasia.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Nodule size increased from 1.2 cm when first presented (age 42) to 2.1 cm at age 40.
